casename: Tan Kim Seng v Ibrahim Victor Adam
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Woo Bih Li J
counsel: Kannan Ramesh and Seetha Ramasamy (Tan Kok Quan Partnership) for appellant; Michele Lim (Salem Ibrahim and Partners) for respondent
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Discontinuance/Automatic discontinuance/Plaintiff failing to take further steps in action for a year after interlocutory judgment entered/Whether rule of automatic discontinuance applies even after interlocutory judgment entered/Order 21 r 2(6) Rules of Court (Cap 322, R 5, 1997 Rev Ed)

Civil Procedure/Discontinuance/Automatic discontinuance/Whether O 21 r 2(6) Rules of Court (Cap 322, R 5, 1997 Rev Ed) inconsistent with s 6(3) Limitation Act (Cap 163, 1996 Rev Ed) if applied to action after interlocutory judgment entered
